description:
This project is a responsive gardening company website for Tipu Garden Management, designed to showcase their services, past projects, and customer reviews.

The frontend was built using React with a custom design, while the backend is powered by WordPress for content management.

The site incorporates custom templates created with PHP, enabling dynamic and tailored content presentation.

Key functionalities include SEO optimization using Yoast SEO, e-commerce integration with WooCommerce, and custom forms for user inquiries through Contact Form 7.

Secure Custom Fields and ACF to REST API were implemented for advanced data handling, while All-in-One Migration facilitated seamless deployment.
tools: React, WordPress, PHP, Vite, Yoast SEO, WooCommerce, Contact Form 7, CPT UI, Secure Custom Fields, ACF to REST API, All-in-One Migration

description:
This project showcases a collection of my favorite albums and artists using a responsive grid-based design.

The album data is dynamically loaded from a JSON file, allowing for easy updates and scalability.

Users can explore key album details, such as artist names, release years, genres, and album art, presented in an interactive card layout.

One of the project's key features is the use of Axios to fetch data from the local JSON file, ensuring the content is dynamic without requiring a full backend.

The cards are styled using CSS Grid for responsive layouts, and subtle hover animations bring the design to life.

This project highlights my skills in front-end development, working with external data, and responsive design.

This project is a Pokémon viewer built with React, where users can explore Pokémon stats, abilities, and moves.

It uses React Router for navigation and Axios to fetch data.

Each Pokémon card shows official artwork, animated sprites, and key stats like HP and attack.

Custom CSS with type-based color schemes and GSAP-powered Pokéball animations create an engaging user experience.

Sound integration adds immersive Pokémon cries, and the layout is responsive across devices using CSS modules.

This project showcases my skills in front-end development, interactive design, and working with APIs.
tools: React, React Router, Axios, GSAP, CSS Modules

description:
This project showcases a dynamic skateboard store with sorting, filtering, and mapping features using a responsive design.

Deck data is dynamically loaded, allowing users to explore key product details such as brand, width, and price, presented in an interactive card layout.

A key feature is the use of jQuery to handle user interactions and Swiper.js for smooth image carousels.

Mapbox integration provides a visual way to explore store locations on a map.

The cards are styled using CSS Grid for responsive layouts, with hover effects to enhance the user experience.

This project demonstrates my skills in front-end development, working with JSON data, and building interactive, data-driven interfaces.
tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Swiper.js, Mapbox, Axios, Illustrator

description:
This project showcases a collaborative craft marketplace built with React, featuring a responsive front-end and secure back-end integration.

The site allows users to browse, filter, and purchase handcrafted items while supporting multiple user roles such as buyers, sellers, and admins.

Key functionalities include smooth navigation with React Router, data handling with Axios, and optimized state management.

The back-end, built with Express and MongoDB, manages authentication, secure file uploads via Cloudinary, and data validation to ensure reliability.

The interface is styled using Sass, with responsive layouts powered by Vite.
tools: React, React Router, Sass, Vite, Axios, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Cloudinary, JWT, Photoshop. Coordinated tasks using Trello, collaborated on design prototypes in Figma, and managed version control with GitHub.

description:
This project is an accommodation booking platform that provides users with a seamless way to find, filter, and book properties across multiple locations.

The site integrates a dynamic search feature, real-time map visualization using Mapbox, and interactive forms with input validation.

Users can filter properties based on location, type, guest capacity, and other amenities, while sort functions help with price comparisons.

Fullpage.js powers smooth navigation across different sections, enhancing the overall user experience.
tools: JavaScript, jQuery, Mapbox, Fullpage.js, Gulp, Sass, GitHub
